algorithm_technique: Use a stack (or list acting as a stack) to process the string. Push characters, and pop when a star is encountered.
problem_summary_simple: Remove stars and the closest non-star character to their left in a string.
problem_summary_technical: Iterate through the string. Push non-star characters onto a stack. When a star is encountered, pop the last non-star character from the stack.
key_insights: The operation of removing the closest non-star character to the left of a star naturally maps to a stack data structure.
When a star is encountered, it cancels out the most recently added non-star character.
The final result is formed by joining the characters remaining in the stack.
